summary: A mixin that equips TensorFlow pretrained models with full text generation capabilities, handling input preparation, past state management, attention masking, logits processing, and automatically routing to the appropriate decoding algorithm (greedy, beam‑search, sampling, or contrastive) based on user‑specified parameters.
business_intent: Enable developers to generate sequences from TF models out‑of‑the‑box, abstracting the complex decoding logic and providing a unified interface for multiple generation strategies.
